greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between the 2-adic valuation of A003973(n) [= the sum of divisors of the prime shifted n] and the 2-adic valuation of the number of divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = 0 when e is even, a(p^e) = A007814(1+A003961(p))-1 when e is odd.
program: A003973(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); sigma(factorback(f)); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 17 2020
